name: A. Raising Bacteria
statement:
You are a lover of bacteria. You want to raise some bacteria in a box.
Initially, the box is empty. Each morning, you can put any number of
bacteria into the box. And each night, every bacterium in the box will
split into two bacteria. You hope to see exactly bacteria in the box at
some moment. What is the minimum number of bacteria you need to put into
the box across those days?
